block.p: SCHONBERGER-Lois. After a long illness Lois Schonberger died September 6, 2000 in her home in White Plains, NY. Wife of Elias Schonberger. Mother of Mark, David, and Stuart. Mother-in-law of Nadine, Diane and Carmen and grandmother of Zach, Alison, Scott, Jacob, Annie and Talia. Funeral service Friday, 9:30AM at Bet Am Sholom Synagogue, 295 Soundview Avenue, White Plains, New York. For further information, Ballard-Durand Funeral Home, White Plains, NY.
